name: 蘇至善
objective: 本課程內容將介紹化工熱力學中兩大問題,Energy flow problem與Phase equilibrium,就由熱力學定義之使用,解決該兩類化工製程中常見之問題
schedule:
1. Thermodynamic: What is it?
2. Mass is not created or destroyed
3. Total energy is not created or destroyed
4. Total entropy cannot decrease
5. Calculation of the properties of pure fluids
6. Phase behavior of pure fluids
7. Thermodynamic properties of mixtures
8. Gibbs energy calculationd
9. Phase equilibria of mixture
scorePolicy:
期中考試: 40 %
期末考試: 40 %
期末報告: 20 %
materials:
Sandler, S. I.,  Chemical, Biochemical and Engineering Thermodynamics, 4th ed., John Wiley & Sons, Inc., N. Y. (2005)
本課程限碩士在職專班同學選修,日間部研究生請勿選修
